q: . This is a major milestone for her and we're hoping that she crosses through many more," said her neurosurgeon Dr. Peter Michael Lemole. Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand , who was present for the eye opening, said: It was raw courage. It was raw strength. It was so beautiful and so moving. Doctors have also helped Gabrielle Giffords sit up and dangle her legs from her bed. She's able to open her right eye, even though it's bandaged. The next milestone will be removing her breathing tube,

Eagles' Michael Vick , Ben Roethlisberger might be the toughest quarterback to sack, said Jets defensive end Shaun Ellis. "He's very strong. He's very elusive in the pocket," Ellis said. A lot of people don't realize how fast he is.... I know he looks slow moving around on the field, but he's pretty nifty at what he does.
